title: Driving in India: 9 Lessons for Anxious Freelancers and Other Adventurous People
description: What happens when you plop an anxious American who hates driving in the middle of India and tell her to learn stick shift?She learns it, apparently, but that's not all.This is a short exploration of the lessons I learned while driving a manual in India that have translated into a healthy mindset for freelancing.Is my anxiety gone? A big fat nope! But it's certainly not worse!Read on to discover nine practical mindsets from a practical writer to help you grow as a freelancer and an adventurous person - even if you have high anxiety.
author: Kelsey Ray Banerjee
